title: The Noble Girl Who Had Her Engagement Broken Off, Today as Well Pushes the Prince off from the Tower - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Game   Aristocracy   Books   Bookworm   Broken Engagement   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Library   Magic   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Oneshot   Royalty
author: Shimozuki Rei   霜月零
description:
I, Hanabelle Cantar, am the fiance of this country’s second prince, Remnass-sama.

That is until today.

Just now, I just had my engagement earnestly broken off by the Prince.

Yes, yes, today is the day that I have been eagerly awaiting all this time.

My wish was to become a Librarian in the “Tower of Books,” Biblio Tower.

Since I’ve had my engagement broken off, I should be free now right?

……So why, is Prince Remnass coming to the tower to see me?

He’s a hindrance to my reading, so I will give it my all to have him allow me to humbly push him out!>
